data.actual_result: Clyde messages flow with the rest of the chat messages
data.expected_result: There is a large gap between the two messages
data.short_description: Clyde messages have a weird gap between the end of the message and the start of the next one on cozy
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure you're on cozy mode - Do anything that will trigger a clyde message (Change your nickname through /nick, DM a user who blocked you, etc.) - Keep the message visible and send a message after the clyde message
